title: Font for Indian Restaurant logo
content: I'm designing a logo for an Indian restaurant. Anyone have any ideas of fonts that might be intereting to explore. Icon will be a stylized sort of chirag lamp.
author: bluemoon

comments.content: A cliche but worth a look is Legende (aka Legend) and you kern it by hand.

Thanks. A possibility. Thats probably a better choice than some of the othe cliche-ish ones I've looked at (Simran, Karolinger). Might give it a try. Was thinking of also trying something a bit more modern with it (at least as an option).

Also what do you think of Eidectic Serif or Sans. Maybe bold italic?
